home.journeyDescription: A friendly and supportive coach, committed to helping you on your journey to success by providing motivation and tools designed to deliver real results through a holistic perspective on your life, goals, and well-being.
home.howICanHelp: I will help you with the following:
home.responsibilitySupportDescription: Building accountability systems and providing ongoing support for your personal growth journey.
home.improvedPerformanceDescription: Enhancing your effectiveness and efficiency in both personal and professional areas of life.
home.personalDevelopmentDescription: Facilitating meaningful transformation and growth through personalized coaching strategies.
home.workLifeBalanceDescription: Creating harmony between your professional ambitions and personal well-being for lasting success.
home.newsletterDescription: Get weekly tips, motivation, and special offers directly to your inbox.
home.heroDescription: Whether you're training for your first 5K or aiming for a marathon PR, I'll help you get there with personalized coaching and support.

services.workWithMeDescription: Choose the coaching option that best fits your needs and goals.
services.step1Description: Select the coaching option that best fits your needs and goals.
services.step2Description: Pick a date and time that works for your schedule.
services.step3Description: Secure your booking with a simple payment process.
services.step4Description: Connect via video call for your coaching session.
services.faqQuestion1: What happens in a coaching session?
services.faqAnswer1: Each session is tailored to your needs, but typically includes discussing your goals, identifying obstacles, developing strategies, and creating action plans. We'll focus on what matters most to you.
services.faqQuestion2: How do I know which service is right for me?
services.faqAnswer2: If you're new to coaching, I recommend starting with a Discovery Call. For specific challenges, a Single Session might be perfect. For ongoing support and deeper transformation, consider a subscription plan.
services.faqAnswer3: Sessions can be rescheduled or cancelled up to 24 hours in advance. Changes made with less notice may result in a cancellation fee.
services.faqAnswer4: I stand behind my coaching services. If you're not satisfied with your first session, I offer a money-back guarantee. Subscription plans can be cancelled anytime, but are non-refundable for completed sessions.
services.readyToTransformDescription: Take the first step toward positive change by booking your session today.

booking.title: Book a Session

booking.noTimesAvailable: No times available on this date

about.title: About Me
about.bio: Hi, I'm Enrique Diaz, a certified life and career coach with over 10 years of experience helping people transform their lives.
about.bioDetail1: My coaching philosophy is centered around empowering you to discover your own answers and potential. I believe that everyone has the capacity to create meaningful change in their lives with the right guidance and support.
about.bioDetail2: After spending 15 years in corporate leadership roles, I discovered my passion for helping others navigate their personal and professional challenges. I've since dedicated my career to coaching individuals from all walks of life, from executives and entrepreneurs to people in career transitions or personal crossroads.
about.approachText1: I take a holistic, client-centered approach to coaching that combines evidence-based techniques with intuitive guidance. My methodology draws from positive psychology, neuroscience, and behavioral change theories.
about.approachText2: What sets my coaching apart is my focus on practical, actionable strategies that create lasting change. I don't just help you set goals—I partner with you to develop the mindset, habits, and skills needed to achieve them.
about.approachText3: Every coaching relationship is unique, and I tailor my approach to your specific needs, learning style, and pace. Whether you're looking for accountability, clarity, or transformational change, we'll work together to create a coaching experience that serves you best.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.getInTouchDescription: Do you have questions or want to know more? Contact me and I'll get back to you soon.
contact.fillForm: Fill out the form below and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.name: Your Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.messageSentSuccess: Thank you for your message. I will get back to you soon!
contact.clientPortalDescription: Log in to access your client portal and send me messages directly.

newsletter.description: Get weekly running tips, training advice, and exclusive content delivered to your inbox.
newsletter.name: Your Name
newsletter.privacyPolicy: We respect your privacy and will never share your information.

serviceTypes.discoveryCallDescription: A 30-minute call to discuss your goals and see if we are a good fit for working together.
serviceTypes.singleSessionDescription: One-on-one coaching session focused on your specific goals and challenges.
serviceTypes.intensiveSessionDescription: An extended session designed to create significant breakthroughs in a specific area.
serviceTypes.monthlyBasicDescription: Ongoing support with regular sessions to help you achieve consistent progress.
serviceTypes.premiumTransformationDescription: Comprehensive coaching package for those committed to significant life changes.
